short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gamify your GitHub experience. Level up , collect skins, climb the leaderboards and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to GitRev Game - a fun, interactive, and gamified approach to code reviews. Our app integrates with your GitHub and transforms routine tasks into a riveting experience. Dive into a world where pull requests become quests, and each issue tackled escalates your hero level.

Use GitRev Game and find assigned issues and pull requests conveniently ranked by difficulty using a state-of-the-art LLM model. Each solved problem grants you points, pushing you up the leaderboards, and closer to the next level. The fun doesn't stop there. Our unique AI not only assigns points but also rewards you with colorful badges for your dedication and prowess.

Turn mundane tasks into thrilling challenges. Join CodeQuest today and revolutionize your coding experience while delivering high-quality code.
